topic.title: Installing using apt-get
topic.shortdesc: This installation uses a package management system.

body.p: To install on Ubuntu 12.04, Ubuntu 14.04 and Debian 8 using apt-get:

ol.li: Download and install the appropriate meta package from the location packages.couchbase.com. This will install the package source and the Couchbase public keys:curl -O http://packages.couchbase.com/releases/couchbase-release/couchbase-release-1.0.0-amd64.deb sudo rpm -i couchbase-release-1.0.0.noarch.deb
Proceed with installing the actual Couchbase Server package: sudo yum update sudo yum install couchbase-server OR sudo yum install couchbase-server-community
